kv18.1:1.4: Nanu atthi buddhavutthāni cetiyāni ārāmavihāragāmanigamanagarāni raṭṭhāni janapadānīti?
kv18.1:1.6: Hañci atthi buddhavutthāni cetiyāni ārāmavihāragāmanigamanagarāni raṭṭhāni janapadāni, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv18.1:2.4: Nanu bhagavā lumbiniyā jāto, bodhiyā mūle abhisambuddho, bārāṇasiyaṃ bhagavatā dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ, cāpāle cetiye āyusaṅkhāro ossaṭṭho, kusinārāyaṃ bhagavā parinibbutoti?
kv18.1:2.6: Hañci bhagavā lumbiniyā jāto …pe… kusinārāyaṃ bhagavā parinibbuto, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv18.1:3.5: “ekamidāhaṃ, bhikkhave, samayaṃ ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharāmi subhagavane sālarājamūle”ti;
kv18.1:3.6: “ekamidāhaṃ, bhikkhave, samayaṃ uruvelāyaṃ viharāmi ajapālanigrodhe paṭhamābhisambuddho”ti;
kv18.1:3.7: “ekamidāhaṃ, bhikkhave, samayaṃ rājagahe viharāmi veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe”ti;
kv18.1:3.8: “ekamidāhaṃ, bhikkhave, samayaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ viharāmi jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”ti;
kv18.1:3.9: “ekamidāhaṃ, bhikkhave, samayaṃ vesāliyaṃ viharāmi mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyan”ti.
kv18.1:3.12: Tena hi buddho bhagavā manussaloke aṭṭhāsīti.
kv18.1:4.3: Nanu bhagavā loke jāto, loke saṃvaḍḍho, lokaṃ abhibhuyya viharati anupalitto lokenāti?
kv18.1:4.5: Hañci bhagavā loke jāto, loke saṃvaḍḍho, lokaṃ abhibhuyya viharati anupalitto lokena, no ca vata re vattabbe—
